File:Herpes LISA.jpeg|Genital herpes: painful postvesicular millimetric lesions with an inflammatory border of the glans.
</gallery>

question.title: What is the primary mode of transmission for genital herpes?

option_a.title: Genital herpes is primarily spread through the air

option_b.title: Genital herpes is primarily spread through skin-to-skin contact with an infected partner

option_c.title: Genital herpes is primarily spread through the consumption of infected food and water

option_d.title: Genital herpes is primarily spread through mother-to-child during childbirth

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
